Class CrypticEngine

java.lang.Object
app.apollo.common.CrypticEngine
public class CrypticEngine extends Object
Utility class providing cryptographic hash functions for data verification.

This class includes a simple XOR-based hash (weak) and a more complex rolling-style hash (strong). These functions are designed for internal use such as block verification or checksum calculations in distributed systems.

Note: These hashing methods are not cryptographically secure and should not be used for security-sensitive operations such as password hashing or digital signatures.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static String
    strongHash(String accumulator, byte[] data, long size)
    Computes a stronger hash by combining values in the byte array using XOR, addition, multiplication, and modulo operations with a custom accumulator.
    static String
    weakHash(byte[] data, Integer size)
    Computes a weak hash of the given byte array using a simple DJB2-like XOR algorithm.

  • Method Details

    • weakHash

      public static String weakHash(byte[] data, Integer size)
      Computes a weak hash of the given byte array using a simple DJB2-like XOR algorithm.
      Parameters:
      data - The byte array to hash.
      size - The number of bytes to read from the array.
      Returns:
      A hexadecimal string representation of the hash value.

    • strongHash

      public static String strongHash(String accumulator, byte[] data, long size)
      Computes a stronger hash by combining values in the byte array using XOR, addition, multiplication, and modulo operations with a custom accumulator.
      Parameters:
      accumulator - Initial hash value represented as a hexadecimal string.
      data - The byte array to hash.
      size - The number of bytes to process.
      Returns:
      A hexadecimal string representation of the resulting hash.
